title: Walnut Canyon National Monument: Park Home
body: Remarkable Rocks, Ancient Cliff Dwellings!  Come gaze across curved canyon walls! Among the remarkable geological formations of the canyon itself, the former homes of ancient inhabitants are easily evident. Along the trails you can imagine life within Walnut Canyon, while visiting actual pueblos and walking in the steps of those who came before.              Free Entrance Days for 2016   The National Park Service turns 100 this year, and we want everyone to join the party! Weâ€™ll offer free admission on 16 days in 2016.
